channel.title: Change xp tht stuff give u
channel.description: i need to know wht do i go into and search for to change the xp tht like a tree or a mining rock gives u could some1 help

item.title: Change xp tht stuff give u
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“b b0yz 4, post:6, topic:218957”]Woodcutting("tree", 1, (500 * playerLevel[8]), 995, 15000, objectID, objectX, objectY, 875); break;[/quote]So chopping down that tree would give you 500 XP and 15K gold. If you were looking for a case, let’s say we’re at the CastleWars lobby.

case 4388: // Castle wars sara portal teleportToX = 2770; teleportToY = 9195; break; The object ID of the Saradomin portal is 4388, and the teleportation is obvious.

Read full topic
item.source: Change xp tht stuff give u

item.title: Change xp tht stuff give u
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

this is wht im lookin for:

Woodcutting("tree", 1, (500 * playerLevel[8]), 995, 15000, objectID, objectX, objectY, 875); break;

and i want to change the xp tht it gives u would i change the 875?? and wht is a reasonable amount of xp tht give u lvl fast but not to fast

Read full topic
item.source: Change xp tht stuff give u

item.title: Change xp tht stuff give u
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

No, you don’t search for
case: ####

You search for
case ####:

And #### is the object ID.

Read full topic

item.title: Change xp tht stuff give u
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Well find the id number of the rocks. Search for this

Case:####

The #### is the number of the rocks. Once you find it there will be something like this under it

addSkillXp

Change the number inside the parentheses

Read full topic
